Dialogue: I am sorry, but, I cannot see. My name is Amelia.
I used to love to paint but I lost my sight when the eye came. I still try to paint, though. No matter how difficult it can be.
You probably think I am silly for trying. I probably am. I used to worry if my art was ever beautiful enough. Now that I am blind, I just wish I painted more.
I do not paint for it to look good. I paint so that I can feel good. If I feel good painting something, then it is beautiful no matter what it looks like.
